# Special Travel Permits

A special travel permit is required to operate an outsized vehicle on the road network. You must obtain this permit through the Ministère des Transports.

## To find out more

Visit the website of the [Ministère des Transports.⁠ ⁠](https://www.transports.gouv.qc.ca/en/camionnage/permis-speciaux/Pages/permis-speciaux.aspx)

Last update: May 17, 2022

- ## Laws and regulations

  - [Vehicle Load and Size Limits Regulation⁠ ⁠](http://www.legisquebec.gouv.qc.ca/en/ShowDoc/cr/C-24.2,%20r.%2031)
  - [Regulation respecting special permits⁠ ⁠](http://legisquebec.gouv.qc.ca/en/ShowDoc/cr/C-24.2,%20r.%2035/)
- ## Other websites

  - [Guide du Règlement sur le permis spécial de circulation⁠ ⁠](https://www.transports.gouv.qc.ca/fr/entreprises-partenaires/ent-camionnage/permis-speciaux/Documents/guide_abrege_permis_speciaux.pdf) (in French only)
  - [Ministère des Transports⁠ ⁠](https://www.transports.gouv.qc.ca/en/Pages/Home.aspx)
